category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: SUBSCMPL_IMDS_declaration_file_prefix
preference.preference_description: Defines the International Material Data Sheet (IMDS) file identifier. The default value is "CMSDAILY_", which means that all files starting with the mentioned (CMSDAILY_*.*) are picked up for processing.
